scripts.start: concurrently -k "cd ../api && yarn dev" "cd ../api && yarn tunnel" "cd ../ui && yarn dev" "cd ../admin && yarn dev"
scripts.pow: yalc publish --push && cd ../abyss && yalc publish --push && cd ../ui && rm -rf node_modules && yarn && cd ../api && rm -rf node_modules && yarn && cd ../admin && rm -rf node_modules && yarn
scripts.lint:all: cd ../ui && yarn lint && cd ../api && yarn lint && cd ../admin && yarn lint
